title: Congressman Mo Brooks on Iran
itunes:title: Congressman Mo Brooks on Iran
description:
Kevin spoke with Emily Miller, Republican strategist and former Communications Director for House Majority Whip, and Josh Galper, co-founder and partner of public relations firm Trident DMG and the law firm Davis, Goldberg & Galper. They discussed President Trump's taxes, USMCA, and 2020 elections.

Kevin also spoke with Congressman Mo Brooks of Alabama about Iran.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
